summary:
### June 2025 Summary for scaffold-eth/se-2-docs

- **Major Features/Improvements:**
  - Merged PR #128 to add an introductory video to the welcome page, enhancing user engagement.

- **Closed Pull Requests:**
  - PR #127 and PR #126, both related to guides for deploying Next.js apps to IPFS, were closed without merging.

- **Overall Themes:**
  - Focus on improving documentation with multimedia content, while also addressing deployment guides, though the latter did not result in merged contributions. 

- **Bug Fixes:**
  - No significant bug fixes reported this month.

topPRs.title: Guide for deploying Next.js app to IPFS
Add guide for deploying Next.js app to IPFSd
